item.title: Home
item.description: Calculate per diem and mileage rates, check the payroll calendar, get fleet assistance, sell to and buy from the government.

item.title: Travel
item.description: Per diem, airfare, mileage rates, fleet vehicles, charge cards and hotels

item.title: Per Diem Calculator
item.description: Calculate federal hotel, meals, and incidental rates

item.title: Airfares
item.description: City Pair airfare rate portal for federal employees and contractors.

item.title: Mileage Rate (POV)
item.description: Calculate mileage reimbursement rates for government or privately owned vehicles.

item.title: Fleet Vehicles
item.description: Report an accident, get roadside aid, or report federal vehicle misuse.

item.title: Parts & Service Providers
item.description: Contact parts and service providers for fleet vehicles.

item.title: Find Fleet Management Center
item.description: Fleet Management Centers (FMCs) assign vehicles and provide administrative support and control in GSA's 11 regions. Locate the FMC in your area.

item.title: Region 1 Fleet Management Centers
item.description: Locate administrative support for government fleet vehicles in Connecticut, Maine, Massachusetts, New Hampshire, Rhode Island and Vermont.

item.title: Region 2 Fleet Management Centers
item.description: Locate administrative support for government fleet vehicles in New Jersey, New York, Puerto Rico, and the U.S. Virgin Islands.

item.title: Region 3 Fleet Management Centers
item.description: Locate administrative support for government fleet vehicles in Delaware, Maryland, New Jersey (R3), Pennsylvania, Virginia, West Virginia.

item.title: Region 4 Fleet Management Centers
item.description: Locate administrative support for government fleet vehicles in Alabama, Florida, Georgia, Kentucky, Mississippi, North Carolina, South Carolina, Tennessee.

item.title: Region 5 Fleet Management Centers
item.description: Locate administrative support for government fleet vehicles in Illinois, Indiana, Michigan, Minnesota, Ohio, and Wisconsin.

item.title: Region 6 Fleet Management Centers
item.description: Locate administrative support for government fleet vehicles in Iowa, Kansas, Missouri, and Nebraska.

item.title: Region 7 Fleet Management Centers
item.description: Locate administrative support for government fleet vehicles in Arkansas, Louisiana, Oklahoma, and Texas.

item.title: Region 8 Fleet Management Centers
item.description: Locate administrative support for government fleet vehicles in Colorado, Montana, North Dakota, South Dakota, Utah, and Wyoming .

item.title: Region 9 Fleet Management Centers
item.description: Locate administrative support for government fleet vehicles in Arizona, California, Hawaii, Nevada, and New Mexico.

item.title: Region 10 Fleet Management Centers
item.description: Locate administrative support for government fleet vehicles in Alaska, Idaho, Oregon, and Washington.

item.title: Region 11 (NCR) Fleet Management Centers
item.description: Locate administrative support for government fleet vehicles in the District of Columbia, and metro-area Maryland and Virginia.

item.title: Travel Resources
item.description: Learn about hotel rates, travel charge cards, airline baggage allowances, and federal travel policy.

item.title: FedRooms
item.description: Find Federal Travel Regulation (FTR) - compliant hotel rooms using FedRooms.

item.title: Travel Card
item.description: Report lost or stolen cards, get Bank contacts and Agency points-of-contact for Travel Card-related issues.

item.description: Travel Card, Charge Card Acquisition Support Division contacts

item.description: Travel Card, Utilization Analysis Division contacts

item.title: Service Delivery
item.description: Travel Card, Service Delivery Division contacts

item.title: Baggage Allowance
item.description: Baggage allowance policy links for City Pair participating airlines

item.description: Find answers to commonly asked travel questions

item.title: Buying & Selling
item.description: Begin your exploration of GSA's function as the procurement arm of the federal government

item.title: How To Buy
item.description: Find products & services from GSA as well as links to a variety of GSA online acquisition tools

item.title: How to Sell
item.description: Tools to help eligible businesses sell to the federal government through GSA

item.title: Intro to Schedules & Contracts
item.description: Get an overview of schedules and other procurement vehicles

item.title: List of GSA Schedules
item.description: This list of GSA Schedules provides access to Schedule Summaries, online contacts and more.

item.title: Interact
item.description: GSA's collaborative social platform where members of the government acquisition community connect.

item.title: Opportunities for Small Business
item.description: An array of programs for small businesses are available from GSA. Link to full site.

item.title: Regulations
item.description: GSA implements government-wide regulations including Federal Acquisition Regulations, Federal Management Regulations, Federal Travel Regulations and the General Services Acquisition Manual.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: Unless you choose to provide information for a specific purpose, we will collect no personal information from you. Find out more.

item.title: Stay Connected
item.description: Stay in touch with GSA through our official social media tools.
